00059 /* ************************************************************** */
00060 /* Active F-Curve */
00061 
00062 /* Find 'active' F-Curve. It must be editable, since that's the purpose of these buttons (subject to change).  
00063  * We return the 'wrapper' since it contains valuable context info (about hierarchy), which will need to be freed 
00064  * when the caller is done with it.
00065  *
00066  * NOTE: curve-visible flag isn't included, otherwise selecting a curve via list to edit is too cumbersome
00067  */
00068 bAnimListElem *get_active_fcurve_channel (bAnimContext *ac)
00069 {
00070     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00071     int filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_ACTIVE);
00072     size_t items = ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00073     
00074     /* We take the first F-Curve only, since some other ones may have had 'active' flag set
00075      * if they were from linked data.
00076      */
00077     if (items) {
00078         bAnimListElem *ale= (bAnimListElem *)anim_data.first;
00079         
00080         /* remove first item from list, then free the rest of the list and return the stored one */
00081         BLI_remlink(&anim_data, ale);
00082         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00083         
00084         return ale;
00085     }
00086     
00087     /* no active F-Curve */
00088     return NULL;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /* ************************************************************** */
00092 /* Operator Polling Callbacks */
00093 
00094 /* Check if there are any visible keyframes (for selection tools) */
00095 int graphop_visible_keyframes_poll (bContext *C)
00096 {
00097     bAnimContext ac;
00098     bAnimListElem *ale;
00099     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00100     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00101     size_t items;
00102     int filter;
00103     short found = 0;
00104     
00105     /* firstly, check if in Graph Editor */
00106     // TODO: also check for region?
00107     if ((sa == NULL) || (sa->spacetype != SPACE_IPO))
00108         return 0;
00109         
00110     /* try to init Anim-Context stuff ourselves and check */
00111     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00112         return 0;
00113     
00114     /* loop over the visible (selection doesn't matter) F-Curves, and see if they're suitable
00115      * stopping on the first successful match
00116      */
00117     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE);
00118     items = ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00119     if (items == 0) 
00120         return 0;
00121     
00122     for (ale = anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00123         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00124         
00125         /* visible curves for selection must fulfill the following criteria:
00126          *  - it has bezier keyframes
00127          *  - F-Curve modifiers do not interfere with the result too much 
00128          *    (i.e. the modifier-control drawing check returns false)
00129          */
00130         if (fcu->bezt == NULL)
00131             continue;
00132         if (fcurve_are_keyframes_usable(fcu)) {
00133             found = 1;
00134             break;
00135         }
00136     }
00137     
00138     /* cleanup and return findings */
00139     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00140     return found;
00141 }
00142 
00143 /* Check if there are any visible + editable keyframes (for editing tools) */
00144 int graphop_editable_keyframes_poll (bContext *C)
00145 {
00146     bAnimContext ac;
00147     bAnimListElem *ale;
00148     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00149     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00150     size_t items;
00151     int filter;
00152     short found = 0;
00153     
00154     /* firstly, check if in Graph Editor */
00155     // TODO: also check for region?
00156     if ((sa == NULL) || (sa->spacetype != SPACE_IPO))
00157         return 0;
00158         
00159     /* try to init Anim-Context stuff ourselves and check */
00160     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00161         return 0;
00162     
00163     /* loop over the editable F-Curves, and see if they're suitable
00164      * stopping on the first successful match
00165      */
00166     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE);
00167     items = ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00168     if (items == 0) 
00169         return 0;
00170     
00171     for (ale = anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00172         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00173         
00174         /* editable curves must fulfill the following criteria:
00175          *  - it has bezier keyframes
00176          *  - it must not be protected from editing (this is already checked for with the foredit flag
00177          *  - F-Curve modifiers do not interfere with the result too much 
00178          *    (i.e. the modifier-control drawing check returns false)
00179          */
00180         if (fcu->bezt == NULL)
00181             continue;
00182         if (fcurve_is_keyframable(fcu)) {
00183             found = 1;
00184             break;
00185         }
00186     }
00187     
00188     /* cleanup and return findings */
00189     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00190     return found;
00191 }
00192 
00193 /* has active F-Curve that's editable */
00194 int graphop_active_fcurve_poll (bContext *C)
00195 {
00196     bAnimContext ac;
00197     bAnimListElem *ale;
00198     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00199     short has_fcurve= 0;
00200     
00201     /* firstly, check if in Graph Editor */
00202     // TODO: also check for region?
00203     if ((sa == NULL) || (sa->spacetype != SPACE_IPO))
00204         return 0;
00205         
00206     /* try to init Anim-Context stuff ourselves and check */
00207     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00208         return 0;
00209         
00210     /* try to get the Active F-Curve */
00211     ale= get_active_fcurve_channel(&ac);
00212     if (ale == NULL)
00213         return 0;
00214         
00215     /* free temp data... */
00216     has_fcurve= ((ale->data) && (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE));
00217     if (has_fcurve) {
00218         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00219         has_fcurve= (fcu->flag & FCURVE_VISIBLE)!=0;
00220     }
00221     
00222     MEM_freeN(ale);
00223     
00224     /* return success */
00225     return has_fcurve;
00226 }
00227 
00228 /* has selected F-Curve that's editable */
00229 int graphop_selected_fcurve_poll (bContext *C)
00230 {
00231     bAnimContext ac;
00232     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00233     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00234     size_t items;
00235     int filter;
00236     
00237     /* firstly, check if in Graph Editor */
00238     // TODO: also check for region?
00239     if ((sa == NULL) || (sa->spacetype != SPACE_IPO))
00240         return 0;
00241         
00242     /* try to init Anim-Context stuff ourselves and check */
00243     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00244         return 0;
00245     
00246     /* get the editable + selected F-Curves, and as long as we got some, we can return 
00247      * NOTE: curve-visible flag isn't included, otherwise selecting a curve via list to edit is too cumbersome
00248      */
00249     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT);
00250     items = ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00251     if (items == 0) 
00252         return 0;
00253     
00254     /* cleanup and return findings */
00255     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00256     return 1;
00257 }
